title: Make Admin Panel header entry a deep pink button for admins

requirements.summary: Render the Admin Panel header navigation entry as a high-visibility deep pink button for admins (desktop + mobile) with accessible interaction states, without changing existing admin gating logic.
acceptanceCriteria: When `isAdmin === true`, the header shows an "Admin Panel" button with a deep pink background (e.g., hex #FF1493 or equivalent Tailwind arbitrary color) and readable high-contrast text.
The desktop header Admin button is visually distinct from other nav items (not `variant="ghost"`) and is immediately noticeable.
The mobile menu Admin Panel entry uses the same deep pink button styling and remains readable.
Hover/active/focus states preserve deep pink styling and include an accessible focus indicator.
When `isAdmin === false`, the Admin button is not shown (existing access logic remains unchanged).

file_operations.description: Update the admin-only navigation Button instances (desktop nav and mobile menu) to use a clear deep pink button style (e.g., bg-[#FF1493] with high-contrast text), including hover/active styling that remains deep pink and focus-visible ring styles for accessibility. Keep the existing `isAdmin && (...)` gating unchanged, and do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
